title: How many universities are in the top 500 in the UK? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: From the QS world rankings 2020, 50 UK universities are in the top 500. The top 20 UK universities are in the top 128 globally. The top 20 universities in the UK (2020) are: Oxford (4 globally), Cambridge (7), UCL (8), Imperial (9), Edinburgh 20), Manchester (27), KCL (33), LSE (44), Bristol (49), Warwick (62), Glasgow (67), Durham (=78), Sheffield (=78), Birmingham (84), Leeds (93), Nottingham (96), Southampton (97), St Andrews (100), QMUL (126), and Lancaster (128). Some subjects within those institutions may have a higher reputation than others. You really need to visit to get a feel of what any university is like. Other rankings are available.
500? Or do you mean out of the top 500 in the world? ;-) Define “top” more clearly, because we could probably spend days arguing about that.
